tha-ap353:0.3_0: He then used sound as a regular monk.
tha-ap353:1.1_0: I used to be in a sorry state.
tha-ap353:3.1_0: the sage has reached the Brahmā realm,
tha-ap353:3.2_0: the world is attached to the world,
tha-ap353:3.4_0: I’ve attained the ending of defilements.
tha-ap353:4.1_0: The lie down on the same sheet
tha-ap353:4.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
tha-ap353:4.4_0: this is the fruit of confidence.
tha-ap353:5.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
tha-ap353:5.2_0: and skeleton without flesh or blood,
tha-ap353:5.3_0: I have realized the six kinds of direct knowledge,
tha-ap353:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Vāsava.
tha-ap353:7.1_0: with the most senior monk who had been consulted.
